subject: Problem with my handbrake order 3066003737970306
description_text:
Hi, I purchased a handbrake from you on aliexpress. Order number 3066003737970306.

It was for a  handbrake that doesn’t work and has major calibration issues.

You can see the videos linked in this mail.

Can you help me ? I tried everything with the preload and the calibration from Windows. Nothing works.

Waiting for your help.

Regards,
Maxime Soubras

conversations.body_text: Hi Maxime Soubras,     Please download FreeJoy 1.7.0. After connecting the device, follow these steps:    Click Read config from device    Click Axis    Click Calibrate    Pull the handbrake several times    Click Stop Calibration    Click Write config to device    After that, please check whether the blue progress bar of the handbrake moves from 0% to 100%. If it works correctly, you can then proceed with the in-game calibration.    https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link     https://drive.google.com/file/d/1R3FyAc8Xh-k_sCnl_Ido__AEeWshLjtT/view?usp=drive_link

Here are the videos showing you I made everything in the right order and the results.

Thanks for your reactivity but I'll not try to make it work for hours again, it should be simple.

Hi Maxime Soubras,  I see that the calibration is complete. Are you referring to the shaking issue? I believe it may be caused by interference from the base. You could try connecting the handbrake to the PC case using a wire attached to a screw and see if that helps.
